name: Tsar of the Flies
description:
Katie Pillar is turning all of the flies evil!!! Use your magic stinger to defeat her and free the insects of Russia!

This game is a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme is joined together. I interpreted the theme as having the bee and the stinger joining together. When you have the stinger, you can shoot, but when it disconnects, you can use bombs. 

It's technically a roguelike, but it doesn't really feel like one. If I had more time, I would have added more items and bosses to give it more of a roguelike feel.

I created all art, music, and sound effects myself. Most of it was created before the jam, because I had the idea for this game a while ago.

If there's problems with the browser version, you can download the game for windows and mac.
